Description: Weekly data on suspected cases of COVID-19 in adult care homes in Scotland.
Name: Coronavirus (Covid-19): additional data about adult care homes in Scotland
Route from landing page to data: On landing page scroll down to download
Sizing Notes: Simple table structure, with a mixture of figures and & with foot side notes.  2 Tables on tabs and some tabs with only charts which can be discounted.
title: Coronavirus (Covid-19): additional data about adult care homes in Scotland
description: Weekly data on suspected cases of COVID-19 in adult care homes in Scotland.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to download

transformStage.name: Table 1 - Care Home Size
transformStage.title: Table 1 - Weekly cumulative number of suspected COVID-19 cases per 1,000 registered places and proportion of adult care homes with suspected COVID-19 case, by size of care home (bed numbers)

transformStage.title: Table 2 - Weekly cumulative number of suspected COVID-19 cases per 1,000 registered places and proportion of adult care homes with suspected COVID-19 case, by sector

transformStage.title: Table 5 - Weekly cumulative number of suspected COVID-19 cases per 1,000 registered places and proportion of adult care homes with suspected COVID-19 case, by Health Board

transformStage.name: Table 5 - People Tested
transformStage.title: Table 5 - Number of Residents and Staff tested in Adult Care Homes

Size of Care Home: Remove 'Beds:' from every entry, leaving only the numbers
Measure Type: Update Measure Type to 'Cumulative Percentage' for percentage values
Unit: Update Unit to 'Percent' for percentage values

Unit: Update Unit to 'Percent' for percentage values

Period: Remove superscript ('1,2,3') tags from Period values (add relevant notes to notes section)

transform.Stage One Notes:
Size of care homes is determined by number of beds.
Cumulative numbers are counts since data was first reported and will include cases which are no longer active
'w/c 15th June 2020' Based on return of 966 of Scotland's 1,080 adult care homes
'w/c 22nd June 2020' Based on return of 987 of Scotland's 1,080 adult care homes
'w/c 29th June 2020' Based on return of 1,006 of Scotland's 1,080 adult care homes
